import { FC } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Button } from '../../shared/Button'; const ContactForm: FC = () => { const { i18n } = useTranslation(['contact-us']); const handleSubmit = (e: any) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (
); }; export default ContactForm;
